system.description:
A shining, very valuable-looking gem. A character who takes the gem comes under a curse.

  • Wandering monsters: Each time the referee checks for wandering monsters, the chance of an encounter is doubled.

  • Pursuit: If the referee rolls to determine whether monsters pursue the character, the chance of pursuit is doubled.

  • Discarding the gem: The jewel reappears, hidden somewhere on the characterâ€™s person, unless the curse is removed by magic (e.g. @UUID[Compendium.ose-advancedfantasytome.spells.Item.LvD3XbuvgBpJ5eEL]{remove curse}).
